issue.title: [Format] Comments on Field table are a bit confusing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5313](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5313). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently Schema.fbs has two different explanations of `Field.children`

One says "children is only for nested Arrow arrays" and the other says "children apply only to nested data types like Struct, List and Union". I think both are technically correct but the latter is much more explicit, we should remove the former.
